categories: Category:Star Wars: The Clone Wars voice actors

nodes.text: Ron Perlman (born April 13, 1950) is an American actor and voice actor, best known to genre fans for portraying the character of Vincent in Beauty and the Beast television series and Hellboy in the two Hellboy films, as well as the narrator in Fallout games. He voiced the Trandoshan scavenger Gha Nachkt in Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
